name: Neato Robotics XV Series Battery Replacement Kit, Set of 2

reviews.name: Neato Robotics XV Series Battery Replacement Kit, Set of 2
reviews.reviewText: Our Neato had gotten where it would only clean for about 10 minutes before it would shut down due to a low battery. At times, it would lock-up and would not charge without hooking it up to our lap top to get it to wake up. The batteries are the life of these machines and once the batteries get where they will not hold a charge the Neato will not perform. Don't buy cheap aftermarket batteries, stay with the factory ones for the best battery life. New batteries will make your Neato perform like when it was new. Worth the money although like most consumers I wish these were in the $30 price range.
reviews.title: Batteries make or break the vacuum performance.

reviews.name: Neato Robotics XV Series Battery Replacement Kit, Set of 2
reviews.reviewText: My husband kept telling me that I needed a new battery and I wouldn't believe him. I got the new battery and the vacuum honestly works better now than when I purchased it.
reviews.title: I am sorry I waited this long to buy it!

reviews.name: Neato Robotics XV Series Battery Replacement Kit, Set of 2
reviews.reviewText: more affordable but still expensive and they will last not quite a year, it's best to replace them every 10 months, still my Neato saves me a lot of work.
reviews.title: more affordable

reviews.name: Neato Robotics XV Series Battery Replacement Kit, Set of 2
reviews.reviewText: Fast shipping to Home. The battery is standard from Neato which has a problem of low capacity. But for the same product Walmart has the lowest price.
reviews.title: Fast shipping to Home

reviews.name: Neato Robotics XV Series Battery Replacement Kit, Set of 2
reviews.reviewText: They perform better than the originals. LONGER RUN TIME
reviews.title: Longer run time
